cause.description:
Our mission is a simple and just one for all the people of Ireland to be a unified and independent state, a freedom that should be enjoyed by all. We also would like the complete withdrawl of all british forces from Ireland whether they be political or military, and all republican prisoners released. And some real respect for our true hero's like Bobby Sands
1. all troops out of Northern Ireland
2. increased standard of living for all
3. (A) UNITED IRELAND NOT A UNITED KINGDOM
cause.name: IRISH UNITY
